desc: MEMEENO - A luxe baby brand specializing in its signature product, the organic cotton belly band for infant gas & colic relief. Included is the unique Swaddloop swaddle blanket, baby belly bloomers, top knot hats & luxe spa items. Spa includes all-natural olive oil soap, organic bamboo washcloths & sisal soap bags.

layout.text: WARM THE BELLY, COMFORT THE HEART
